item.description:
Karan Casey is a most amazing Irish singer. Check her out if you don't already know who she is...

I'd like to reserve one table for 4 people at this concert at Club Passim - so we need to book fast as it's a small venue. Sitting at a table you get a better view but you have to buy food - which is nice and not expensive (Veggie Planet). They also serve beer and wine.

If you are interested, please let me know and sign up with payment immediately. I'm only taking RSVPS until Sunday at 5 pm as I don't want to miss this opportunity. This show will probably sell out and the venue doesn't lend itself to large numbers of people so I'm limiting numbers to me plus 3 people. For those wanting to sign up after this deadline you can go to the Club Passim website and book yourself but we won't necessarily be able to sit together.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet for drink at Casablanca first at 7 pm.
item.name: Karan Casey at Passim
